A Better Way to Manage Daycare Waitlists

WeeWait makes it easy for parents to join the queue and for daycares to manage applications — all in one place.

Get Started

How It Works

"WeeWait made the whole daycare process so much easier. I applied in minutes and always knew our spot on the list."

— Emily, mom of a 4-year-old

Find Childcare Near Me

Why Parents Choose
WeeWait

Save Time

Apply to multiple daycares at once - no repeated forms or calls.

Stay Informed

Get real-time updates when your status changes or a spot opens.

Reduce Stress

Get real-time updates when your status changes or a spot opens.

All in One Place

Track your applications, invitations, and responses in one clear dashboard.

I Got Off the Waitlist Without the Chaos

"As a mom of three, I've been through it all — endless forms, phone calls, and waiting weeks just to hear back. WeeWait was a total game changer. I created one profile, selected a few daycares, and the platform took care of the rest. I didn't have to track anything manually — I got a notification the moment a spot opened up. It honestly made my life so much easier."

— Emily, mom of a 4-year-old

I Got Off the Waitlist Without the Chaos

"As a mom of three, I've been through it all — endless forms, phone calls, and waiting weeks just to hear back. WeeWait was a total game changer. I created one profile, selected a few daycares, and the platform took care of the rest. I didn't have to track anything manually — I got a notification the moment a spot opened up. It honestly made my life so much easier."

— Emily, mom of a 4-year-old

Let's Make Childcare Together

Whether you're a parent looking for a spot or a daycare ready to streamline applications — we’re here to help.

Contact us

Create Your Profile

Tell us about your child and daycare preferences — it only takes a few minutes.

Get Started

Select Daycares

Browse our catalog and choose the centers you’re interested in.

Get Started

Be Notified of Openings

You’ll receive real-time notifications the moment a daycare updates your status or offers a spot.

Get Started
WeeWait

Built by parents, for parents
